title: Verify http header pfrofile can be added when no http header profile pre-exist in RTP
custom_steps:
1.Create a Web Access policy with 'alert'
2.Create http header profile request:custom:host==google.com, zoom.us ,evernote.us
3.Update the RTP and attach the http header profile
4.Access website to match the policy
custom_expected:
Policy and profiles created successfully
http header value and policy match in proxy logs is found
Skope-it event is generated for alert activity
